page.title: 08SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: At school we do maths,mainly S.M.P. and every morning we do mental arithmetic. We do spelling from cards with questions on and at the side is a column with the answers in and you have to choose the right words. We also do S.R.A. which is a kind of reading scheme,English and quiet reading. We do Environmental studies,usually in the afternoons.We have been doing some work on The Viking Centre at York.At the moment we are doing work on Butterflies and Moths. In craft we are making Ghost puppets and in English we are writing Ghost stories. We do sport and P.E.We play netball, rounders and sometimes stoolball.The boys play football and cricket.
